name: Peanut Butter Blueberry Frozen Yogurt Bites Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: plain greek yogurt, honey, peanut butter, blueberry
recipeIngredient: ¼ cup plus 2 tablespoons peanut butter
recipeInstructionSteps: In a bowl, add the Greek yogurt and honey and stir to combine.
Transfer 3 tablespoons of the mixture into 6 lined muffin tins.
Microwave the peanut butter for 15 seconds. Spoon 1 tablespoon of the softened peanut butter over each yogurt cup.
Sprinkle blueberries over the yogurt cups.
